text:
@marklevinshow Gee Mark, I guess he knew Covid-19 was coming along from way back in 2008.
What a man that Obama was, not only stylish, not only intelligent, but psychic too.
🤣🤣🤣
I hate to say this Mark, but you are not looking very bright right now.
